message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper is about ad-hoc retrieval, which is a subfield of information retrieval (IR), and focuses on using deep learning models to improve retrieval performance. Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions natural language processing (NLP) tasks such as paraphrase identification, question answering, and automatic conversation, which are covered in cs.CL. The use of deep neural networks also suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.LG and cs.AI. Finally, the paper mentions computer vision as an area where deep neural networks have led to breakthroughs, which suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.CV.
